nodes.text: Ottethan was an astronomical object that was one of the homeworlds of the semi-sentient rancor species, along with Felucia and Dathomir.

Ottethan was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 young-readers reference book Star Wars: Creatures vs. Aliens written by Pablo Hidalgo. The planet Ottethan was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in 1992 via Dark Empire 3, the third issue of the Star Wars: Dark Empire series of comic books written by Tom Veitch.
